channel.title: Changelogs on Halcyon IDE
channel.description: Recent content in Changelogs on Halcyon IDE

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Version 2.0.1 (codename:Aeolus) Design changes Refined scan settings script-args-file support Documentation update Better version controlling Licence changed to MIT and some bug fixes Release date: January 10, 2018 Version 2.0 Stable Release Improved user interface Added more code intelligence rules Updates in code builder Easy scan configuration wizard TCP/UDP Scan Settings Post Development Actions - Export/Update Scripts Some bug fixes Release date: March 31, 2016
